entry.title: Python developer
entry.text:
#вакансия #python #Django #vacancy #IT  #remote

I’m looking for a very strong python developer to become one of key engineers for one of our clients. The client is a US-based startup developing revolutionary products in the Gaming and Lottery industries using NFC and SmartCard-based solutions. This role is extremely important for our client as it has the responsibility of coordinating with the whole team to provide a backend and APIs that support mobile and web clients, as well as third-party integrations.

Location: Remote
Job Type: Full-time, contract
Industries: Technology, Gaming, Lottery
Languages: English, Russian
Pay Rate: $25/hr - $35/hr depending on experience
Probationary Period: 1 month
Start Date: ASAP

Qualifications
BS in Information Systems, Engineering, other related discipline 
6-10 years Software Engineering experience
4-6+ years of work experience developing in Python
2-3+ years developing on the Django platform
Working experience with microservices architecture.
Solid understanding of data structures, coding standards, best practices
Development experience in Cloud and DevSecOps environments
Experience working with relational databases and various data formats and technologies.
Experience with test-driven development
Experience working in adaptive methodologies like Agile, DevOps and Scrum, etc.
Strong written and communication skills required.
Must be a self-starter/self-directed member of the team
Proficient with Git
B2+ CEFR English level

For more information, write to the PM.
